title: Great Sand Dunes National Park & Preserve: Park Home
body: Dunes Among Diversity  The tallest dunes in North America are the centerpiece in a diverse landscape of grasslands, wetlands, conifer and aspen forests, alpine lakes, and tundra. Experience this diversity through hiking, sand sledding, splashing in Medano Creek, wildlife watching, and more!              Plan Your Visit   Things to do, current and forecast conditions, camping and lodging, and more...            Medano Creek Conditions and Forecast   Detailed Medano Creek conditions and forecast flow, flow graph, and what to expect month by month in an average year        Things to Do   Sand sledding, Medano Creek beach play, experiencing the night, hiking through forests, climbing to alpine lakes and peaks, and more...         Weather Forecasts and Info, Webcam View   Get the best weather forecasts for various elevations in the park and preserve, weather info for each season, and a live webcam view
